rules_text:
Barren Ashlands enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{5}{BR}: Barren Ashlands becomes a 3/3 black and red Lizard creature with first strike until end of turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your devotion to black and red. Activate only once each turn.
